item.title: Need help with firecape minigame
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Inside Dead Inside
item.description:
@Dead_Inside wrote:

So umm I got all the things right I think for 63 waves…look

} public void getWavekillCount() { if(TzWave != -1) if(TzWave == 1) KilledTz = 0; else if(TzWave == 2) KilledTz = 1; else if(TzWave == 3) KilledTz = 3; else if(TzWave == 4) KilledTz = 6; else if(TzWave == 5) KilledTz = 10; else if(TzWave == 6) KilledTz = 15; else if(TzWave == 7) KilledTz = 21;
public void SpawnNewWave() { if(TzWave == 1) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2380, 5105, heightLevel); NeededKills = 1; } if(TzWave == 2) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2379, 5070, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2382, 5107, heightLevel); NeededKills = 3; } if(TzWave == 3) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2381, 5104, heightLevel); NeededKills = 6; } if(TzWave == 4) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2378, 5074, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2408, 5107, heightLevel); NeededKills = 10; } if(TzWave == 5) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2388, 5070, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2419, 5083, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2381, 5106, heightLevel); NeededKills = 15; } if(TzWave == 6) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2381, 5100, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2408, 5070, heightLevel); NeededKills = 21; } if(TzWave == 7) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2631, 2390, 5069, heightLevel); NeededKills = 22; } if(TzWave == 8) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2631, 2381, 5106, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2378, 5072, heightLevel); NeededKills = 24; } if(TzWave == 9) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2631, 2381, 5106, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2378, 5072, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2408, 5107, heightLevel); NeededKills = 27; } if(TzWave == 10) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2631, 2381, 5106, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2378, 5072, heightLevel); NeededKills = 31; } if(TzWave == 11) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2381, 5106, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2631, 2378, 5072, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2408, 5107, heightLevel); NeededKills = 36; } if(TzWave == 12) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2381, 5106, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2408, 5107, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2631, 2398, 5072, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2397, 5096, heightLevel); NeededKills = 42;

(there are more waves I just didn’t post them all)…so anyway my problem is that when I got test it out it the last wave starts which is jad instead of starting from the first wave…how do I make it start from the first wave not last wave?..
Thanks
